price: 66. Maalinta wejiyadooda lagu rogrogi  Naarta, waxay odhan: wayoo waye haddaanu adeeci lahayn Alle, adeecina lahayn Rasuulka.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma tuqallabu wujūhuhum fī al-nāri yaqūlūna yālaytanā aṭaʿnā al-laha wa-aṭaʿnā al-rasūlā
